thread.title: Willard Bay State Park to host Trick or Treat Hunt
thread.title_full: Willard Bay State Park to host Trick or Treat Hunt

title: Willard Bay State Park to host Trick or Treat Hunt
text:
Published: Tuesday, Oct. 20 2015 3:10 p.m. MDT Updated: 15 minutes ago Summary 
Get ready to have fun at the Trick or Treat Hunt at noon Saturday at Willard Bay State Park. 
WILLARD, Box Elder County â€” Get ready to have fun at the Trick or Treat Hunt at noon Saturday at Willard Bay State Park. 
Visitors are encouraged to come dressed in their best costumes and be ready to go on the hunt for Halloween eggs filled with toys and candy at Eagle Beach. 
Children must be 12 years of age or younger to participate. Arrive a little early to be divided into age groups, ages 4-under, 5-8 and 9-12. 
Entrance fees still apply. Families arriving with children dressed in costumes will be charged half price. Recommended Stories
